title: Excimer
author: Excimer
created_time: November 23, 2023, 10:44:34 AMLast edit: February 12, 2025, 05:13:16 PM by Excimer
content: reserved for Poker Player (aka Free Market Capitalist) accusation

comments.author: Excimer
comments.body: I have no desire to stay on this forum anymore. Waste of time.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Excimer on November 23, 2023, 10:44:34 AMI still don't understand how people make a career here. Nobody shares their secrets.The secret is that we are here to support Bitcoin, not try to "make a career" here.¬† If you are here for Bitcoin and do things to help Bitcoin, success will find it's way to you.¬† If you come here trying to earn a profit for yourself off the backs of others, you will probably end up wasting whatever time you dedicate to this place.¬† Everyone here has a common interest.¬† Bitcoin.¬† My advice is to focus on ways you can provide value for Bitcoin instead of focusing on ways to leech some money from the community for your own gain.¬† That's the secret.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.created_time: January 08, 2025, 05:47:59 PMLast edit: January 08, 2025, 05:58:52 PM by Excimer
comments.body: I don't understand anything. People come here for answers, or to tell their experiences and share their opinions. But instead they are forced to fight with some competitors who sit in DT and trollIt feels like people come here to fight and prove something, and not to share their opinions.I once had a duck burnt in the oven at the time when I was trying to prove something to someone.This forum is a waste of time and resources.

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: Excimer on January 08, 2025, 05:34:47 PMI have no desire to stay on this forum anymore. Waste of time.Best news I've heard in the last two minutes. Please leave and take your army of sockpuppets with you.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.body: Quote from: suchmoon on January 08, 2025, 05:56:48 PMPlease leaveI need to buy eye drops. The forum has ruined my vision. Then I'll leaveBut i can't afford to buy eye drops - I have no moneyI don't know why, but after 5 minutes of being on the forum, for some reason my head starts to hurt and I start to feel nauseous.Please make the letters less contrasting - they hurt the eyes

comments.author: Onyeeze
comments.body: Quote from: Excimer on November 23, 2023, 10:44:34 AMI am registered at 2019. Now is a 2025 year.I see many happy and well-fed users who earn $1,000 daily on the bitcointalk.com forum.¬† I'm not sure that people is earning such amount you made mentioned¬† daily on forum, if its so many people would have become millionaire with bitcointalk.org, I think this information is false one, the information can only not be false information if their is a process of earning in bitcointalk.org that is in secret.Quote from: Excimer on November 23, 2023, 10:44:34 AMI am dissapointed in bitcoin, bitcointalk.com and Satoshi. You should notvbe disappointed on bitcointalk.org and even satoshi, because if you follow the rules of bitcointalk.org without breaking the rules you love to be in bitcointalk.org, because a situation whereby you violent the rules and regulations of the forum you will be disappointed because you're guilty. Satoshi brought ideas by developing bitcoin with its group, and the reason is to make a unique currency that will help the world and he actualize it, you should be happy with satoshi not to be disappointed at him.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.created_time: January 08, 2025, 07:13:00 PMLast edit: January 08, 2025, 08:32:36 PM by Excimer
comments.body: bitcointalk.org so never gave me anything usefulbitcointalk.org so never gave me any knowledgeonly loss of health, vision, time and resourcesif before I had crypto enthusiasmnow I just have apathy towards bitcoinnewbies don't repeat my mistakesif the crypto-forum doesn't give you anything usefuland doesn't teach you to earn money - pass byI was 7 years here on bitcointalkand still dont know how to earn hereno one seems to teach thisthey only know how to loudly brag about their profitsthey only know how to rig votes in contestsI don't see a real community on the forumonly ads, scammers and spammersyou can see how disappointed people are and every day there are more and more of them

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: Excimer on November 23, 2023, 10:44:34 AMI see many happy and well-fed users who earn $1,000 daily on the bitcointalk.com forum.Do you mean to say $1,000 monthly? 1k daily is outrageous to think that people make such amount here.Quote from: Excimer on January 08, 2025, 07:13:00 PMnewbies don't repeat my mistakesif the crypto-forum doesn't give you anything usefuland doesn't teach you to earn money - pass byThe irony of the matter is that Bitcointalk teaches both.Quote from: Excimer on January 08, 2025, 07:13:00 PMI was 7 years here on bitcointalkand still dont know how to earn hereIf your aim of joining a forum is to earn, and you spent 7 years without learning how to earn, it's obvious the forum isn't the problem but you. You can't be in a place that is not adding value to you for a whooping 7 years.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.body: Quote from: KingsDen on January 08, 2025, 09:12:17 PMYou can't be in a place that is not adding value to you for a whooping 7 years.now i realize what a fool i was that i spent so many years on this forum and don't earn anythingQuote from: KingsDen on January 08, 2025, 09:12:17 PMIf your aim of joining a forum is to earn, and you spent 7 years without learning how to earn, it's obvious the forum isn't the problem but you. I am a ordinary user and came here to readthen I saw that here are all bragging about their achievements and how they have a lot of money in the form of bitcoinsI tried to find out how people here earn bitcoin on the forum but I so didn't understand anythingthe forum didn't give me anything

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: Excimer on January 08, 2025, 09:24:25 PMQuote from: KingsDen on January 08, 2025, 09:12:17 PMIf your aim of joining a forum is to earn, and you spent 7 years without learning how to earn, it's obvious the forum isn't the problem but you. I am a ordinary user and came here to readthen I saw that here are all bragging about their achievements and how they have a lot of money in the form of bitcoinsI tried to find out how people here earn bitcoin on the forum but I so didn't understand anythingthe forum didn't give me anythingBut you can still earn from the forum if you do the right things. Although it's not going to be as easy as it was 7 years ago when you can easily earn bitcoin from faucets.Now you have to do the following; Stop being negative and bittered. Spend each day to discover what you like about the forum. Stop dwelling in the negative side. Is there some services you can render and be paid in BTC, you can list them in the service section. You are a Snr member, if your account was not marked with red, you could earn weekly through signature campaign( if only you don't see them all as scam) Just try your best to be an ordinary good user of the forum, besides the forum promised us nothing and as such owes us nothing.

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: I believe the OP just wants attention and surprisingly he's been given. This is the end for him in BTT but he still has time replying messages in the thread.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.created_time: January 08, 2025, 10:09:16 PMLast edit: January 08, 2025, 10:26:58 PM by Excimer
comments.body: Quote from: Ambatman on January 08, 2025, 09:50:57 PMI believe the OP just wants attention and surprisingly he's been given. ¬†I repeat:I am a ordinary user and came here to readThen my attention was drawn to the monkeys advertising the word "Ch*pm*xer". I didn't want to read them, but in every post they had the word "Ch*pm*xer". These monkeys did everything to attract attention. So Ambatman it's a big question who was trying to attract whose attention hereThen I realized that these monkey earning its money by promoting that word "Ch*pm*xer"But when I tried to find out how to join their sect, it turned out that they take monkeys who will actively spam and flood everywhere. I refused.Quote from: Ambatman on January 08, 2025, 09:50:57 PM This is the end for him in BTT but he still has time replying messages in the thread. People are increasingly realizing that the forum is not what it used to be. I am no longer interested in your forum. This is more the end for the forum than for me as a user. Quote from: KingsDen on January 08, 2025, 09:46:26 PMIs there some services you can render and be paid in BTC, you can list them in the service section.I can participate in discussions and fairly resolve disputes, without paying attention to any DT authorities who sometimes cover for their prot√©g√©s. I am not afraid of any accusations from these monkeys and I am not afraid of anything at all. I can identify and expose falsifications and fake votes in competitions, I have already studied their methods.I can advertise your tokens (but not scams or shitcoins). But only in free form, without requirements for the number of posts. I am for organic growth and against spam and floodingI do not know how else I can be useful. Do you have o job for me?
